quoted_tweet.text:
Stellar Performance by CCL!
Produced 6.4 MT coal in June 24, a staggering growth of about 12% compared to June 23. First quarter  production in FY-25 soared to a record breaking 19.2 MT, with a quarterly growth of about 10% !
Striving to fulfill the energy demands of the nation. https://t.co/tU8bdhD5B3
